-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
LastXP v17.1.1

Built on top of previous improvements to make certain the final result is top quality.

Features:

* ssWPI v6.5 - 
- Now with category selection icons
- Presets
- ppApps
- Hide Installed apps from list of selections
- Improved Fader with per app alpha blended png support
- Fully themeable with Theme builder to simplify changing the Layout/Position and Size of the ssWPI screen

* SetupS -
- Send To support
- Does ppApps and Addons.
- Uses updated apps off other non install media (Caddy/Flash/Non Sys Partition/HDD)

* ssWPI App Builders -
- New versions for creating your own SetupS Apps, ppApps
- Tools for backing up your ppApps for use on other PC&#039;s or to include in ssWPI v6.5 installers.

* Boot Menu Options -
- Acronis True Image 11
- Hiren&#039;s BootCD 9.2
- Install Safe
- Install using Extra Sata/Raid

* SavePE (LiveXP) -
- Acronis Disk Director 10
- ppApp support (Including HDD installed ones)
- Extra Sata/Raid support

*DriverPacks Included (Optional per Item using DPSelect):
- Chipset-709
- CPU-7041
- Graphics_A-710
- Graphics_B-710
- Graphics_C-7091
- LAN-7091
- MassStorage-7092
- Sound_A-710
- Sound_B-710
- WLAN-7092

290 Apps and Options:

- Corel PSP X2
- Link Luster Tools
- Nero 8 Micro
- Office 2003 SP3 Lite
- QT Address Bar
- Visual Basic 6 SP6 (Not silent)
- Vista Sidebar SP1
- Window Blinds 6

* What&#039;s a ppApp? -
The idea behind a ppApp is to seperate your apps from your OS as much as possiable while keeping them easily integrated/accessable to use.
They exists on any fixed HDD and when you run the Generator tool or use installer to add new ones, it&#039;ll create Shortcuts, File types, register dll/ocx and run a script.

* What are the Benefits of ppApps? -
- No extra time needed after OS install installing/updating and configuring each app.
- Each app will be Updated (even after install).
- Each will have the settings always set how you like them.
- No reason to worry yourself with backing things up before you format/install your PC.
- Each app will be pre cracked and ready to run.
- No messing about finding where on your pc you&#039;ve stored the latest version and the working Crack.
- No Sorting the Start Menu every OS you install.
- Really easy to create a ppApp to include with your ppApps installer
- Migrating your apps to another persons Install/collection only involves copying a single folder.
- Less time Defragging as the apps never move location.

* Thanks To -
- appzpoint.net - For having a place to call home.
- TeamLXP/V - For contributing ideas/time and information to LastXP development.
- Daunte, Janno, Barrywhite and n-joy - For vowing to spread this release to the ends of the earth.
- YOU! - For offering encouragement, feedback and keeping the damand high.


LastXP v17 Update Fix 1 by Team LXP
LastXP v17 to v17.1.1

Removed:
-Vistasidebargadgets
   
Fixed:
* No selecting a Sort start method.
* Make ppApps Drive selector appear on a fresh install PC with more than 1 Drive/partition.
* ppApps drive selector is failing to be set
* Heading in ssWPI for current category
* Office 2007 with Start.exe update.

* KelsCplBonusAddon v6.6
